title: Hi, I‚Äôm Zhiyun üëã
text:
Welcome! I'm a computational biologist working on applied Machine Learning on omics data to better assist personalized medicine. 
    I'm also passionate about building user-friendly interactive tools to make my ML models and non-trivial data analysis more accessible to a wider audience.

title: Hi, I‚Äôm Zhiyun üëã
text:
Highlights

SSc Subtyping ‚Äî ML models integrating skin & blood RNA‚Äëseq
Bayesian Optimization Toolkit ‚Äî R package + Shiny UI
Spatial/single‚Äëcell interests ‚Äî atlases, generative models, target discovery

‚û°Ô∏è Check out the Projects page for live demos, or read the About page for my background.






Tip



If you‚Äôre hiring for postdocs or industry R&D roles (UK/US), feel free to reach out.

title: Welcome to my Quarto blog
text:
This is a starter post. Add notebooks (.ipynb) or Markdown/Quarto (.qmd) files to the posts/ folder and they‚Äôll appear here automatically.
Thanks ChatGPT for creating this fake post for me :)

title: About
text:
I'm a PhD candidate in Quantitative Biomedical Sciences at Dartmouth (advisor: Michael Whitfield).
    Previously, I completed an MS in  Computational Biology at Carnegine Mellon University, and earned my BSc in  Bioinformatics from Xi'an Jiaotong Liverpool University, China / University of Liverpool, UK.

    Research focus
    
      Machine Learning on bulk & single-cell omics for patient stratification and precision medicine 
      Interactive, reproducible analysis with Shiny, Dash, and Streamlit

title: Thoughts
text:
Hello world -
So many thoughts floating in my mind
The self is such a simple but yet complex concept
Can‚Äôt be closer physically sometimes
Can‚Äôt be farther away or more detached in some ways
It‚Äôs a daily exercise to be honest with her
To listen
To accept
To just be
To forgive
So she doesn‚Äôt get lost and scared again

title: Thanks!

title: PROTOCOL Dashboard ‚Äî Bayesian Optimization for Cloud Labs
text:
This interactive dashboard accompanies our paper:
Asynchronous parallel Bayesian optimization for AI-driven cloud laboratories
Trevor S Frisby, Zhiyun Gong, Christopher James Langmead
Bioinformatics, Volume 37, Issue Supplement_1, July 2021, Pages i451‚Äìi459
https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btab291
The dashboard lets you: - Run PROTOCOL ‚Äî PaRallel OptimizaTiOn for CLoud Laboratories - Compare with other Bayesian optimization algorithms - Visualize optimization progress and results - Experiment with different simulated lab settings
